titleStmt.title: A friends aduice in an excellent ditty, concerning the variable changes in this world : to a pleasant new tune.
titleStmt.author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Campion by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
